name: FreedomSpeaks
0:
”Alexa, open Freedom Speaks”
”Alexa, start Freedom Speaks”
”Alexa, launch Freedom Speaks”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: freedom speaks
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Just say "Alexa, open freedom speaks."

These moving tales will give you a deeper understanding of the strength and resilience of Iranian women. Through voice AI, we bring the words of iconic Iranian women poets and writers from the past to life. 

A storyteller for the modern world, it can inspire others to leverage it as a tool for freedom of expression and the preservation of knowledge and culture. With your help, we can continue to build this important collection of stories and preserve the richness of the Persian language.

If voice AI speaks their names, they can never be forgotten.

The poetry, stories and music featured are performed by author Azar Nafisi, journalist, writer Jacki Lyden, novelist Alice McDermott, author and women’s rights activist Mahnaz Afkhami, artists Esha Sadr and Saeideh Gilani, singer songwriter Phoenix Pagliacci, as well as storytelling technologist Iran Davar Ardalan, among others.

Freedom speaks is produced by Iran Davar Ardalan, Ezinwa Amadi, Nikki McLay, Tali Weinberg, Kimberly Mishra, Maddy Apple, Carrie Jaquith, Paris Golab, Tina Soleimanifar, Sahar Mazloom and Bhuva Shakti with music by Push.Audio.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
